article_title: 3 Unconventional Reasons To Contribute To An IRA

article_metadata.author: Financial Finesse

og.description: Did you max out your IRA contributions for 2015? ($5,500 if you're under 50 and $6,500 if you're 50 or older) If not, you actually have until April 18th of this year to do so. While you may be aware of the benefits of tax deferral for a traditional IRA [...]
